pullrequest.title: Remove manual setting of flags for dynamic linking of the Windows CRT library

content.raw: @\_jrivero\_ I did some tests that this works on my machine running Visual Studio 2015, but it would be helpful to run the `ignition_transport-ci-default-windows7-amd64` OSRF Jenkins job on this modification before merging.
content.html: @_jrivero_ I did some tests that this works on my machine running Visual Studio 2015, but it would be helpful to run the ignition_transport-ci-default-windows7-amd64 OSRF Jenkins job on this modification before merging.
